Posts.EditableText: Quest 3.53 is now available from http://www.axeuk.com/quest/download.htm This release fixes a number of bugs. Quest Pro now includes QuestNet Server Home Edition, with support for up to 30 users. QuestNet Server Pro Edition now supports up to 1000 users. If you have any questions or problems, please post here or send me an email.
Posts.HTML:
Quest 3.53 is now available from http://www.axeuk.com/quest/download.htm

This release fixes a number of bugs.

Quest Pro now includes QuestNet Server Home Edition, with support for up to 30 users.

QuestNet Server Pro Edition now supports up to 1000 users.

If you have any questions or problems, please post here or send me an email.

Posts.EditableText: it's about time.  developers have been waiting for this for a while, i'm sure.

Posts.EditableText:
3 users for the lite version... 30 users for 'Quest Pro'.

I read through a bit of the versions, helpfile and Al's typelib.pdf files (sheesh, was a bit tired after that!)... Interesting reads - especially Al's (which I remember reading about the cloths layers before).

I like a few of the idea's in there - should read a bit into using the type-library...
